body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is James Ramirez and I represent AutoPro Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Jennifer Foster.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jennifer. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad because of the poor product quality of the car I purchased.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you provide me with the VIN number of your car?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The VIN number is one two three four five, six seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Could you also share the date of your car purchase with me in the format day month year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I purchased the car on the third of March twenty twenty one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Jennifer. We will investigate the issue further. Your feedback is valuable to us. Thank you for your time.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your assistance. Goodbye.
